title: Drawing, "Plan for the hospital of St. Trinita de Pellegrini, Rome"
medium: Pen and brown ink, graphite, red pencil, green ink (on verso)
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457e)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Two objects are associated with this accession number. The dimensions of the second are 20.2 x 12.8 cm.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Plan for the hospital of St. Trinita de Pellegrini, Rome".
Pen and brown ink, graphite, red pencil, green ink (on verso). Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1103-1,2.
